title: Creative Social Studies Class Design through Generative AI and Maker Education [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary understanding of maker education, foundational social studies knowledge, and smartphone proficiency
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented course where pre-service teachers design social studies project lessons by integrating generative AI tools (chatbots, image generators) and simple maker kits (paper circuits, low-cost sensors) via smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can generate three or more maker project ideas for social studies topics using generative AI tools
Learners can complete one project design proposal combining smartphone-based AI tools and low-cost materials to investigate social phenomena
Learners can improve maker project designs two or more times by incorporating peer feedback

resources: Low-Cost Maker Kit (Paper Circuits, Basic Sensors, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
